output.sentences: The unveiling of the statue was sponsored by Chevrolet and shown on network TV.
People came from all around to pay their respects alongside the soldiers.
The entire local veterans organization attended the ceremony.
Each of the highest ranking officers delivered a moving speech.
The statue now stands as a symbol of the respect our town has for the heroes of our nation.
